title: Glottography dataset derived from Schapper 2020 "1. Introduction to The Papuan languages of Timor, Alor and Pantar. Volume 3"
description:
Cite the source of the dataset as:

Schapper, Antoinette. 2020. 1. Introduction to The Papuan languages of Timor, Alor and Pantar. Volume 3. In Schapper, Antoinette (ed.) 1–52. Berlin, Boston: De Gruyter Mouton. doi: doi:10.1515/9781501511158-001.
